title: Karen Goncharov, President of National Association of Tourism Development - INNOVATION RUSSIA, to speak at RHIC 2015
text:
Karen Goncharov, President of National Association of Tourism Development – INNOVATION RUSSIA, to speak at RHIC 2015 Published on : Friday, October 2, 2015
Karen Goncharov, Founder and President of the National Association of Tourism Development – INNOVATION RUSSIA, is to participate in a session on “Developing Russia as a tourist destination” at the upcoming Russia & CIS Hotel Investment Conference (RHIC).
The Association has defined strategic goals for the domestic tourism industry, with the aim of increasing inbound tourists in the Russian Federation to 70 million by 2020, a staggering increase on the 27.5 million that visited in 2014. Based on these goals the impact on accommodation, infrastructure and jobs in tourism is enormous.
The conference session will be moderated by Sergey Kolesnikov, Vice-President of the Federation of Restaurateurs and Hoteliers and Karen Goncharov will be joined by other leading industry experts; Ludmila Koudryavtseva, Chief Executive Officer of The Baltic Travel Company and Sergey Voytovich, Deputy Director at NAO Krasnaya Polyana. The session will discuss how to develop a national sustainable tourism policy as part of the national industrial plan to create employment and economic growth.
Karen Goncharov has been working in the tourism industry for 25 years. In 1991 he set up a tour operator company «DSBW-TOURS». In March 2015 he founded INNOVATION RUSSIA. Goncharov is a member of the expert team on tourism in Presidential Putin’s Executive Office and has direct contacts with Russian decision-makers. This year he was a speaker at the Parliamentary hearings on the “Development of inbound and domestic tourism as the most important segments of Russian Federation tourism industry” which were held in the State Duma of Russian Federation.
INNOVATION RUSSIA was created for development of inbound and domestic tourism in the Russian Federation, the formation and promotion of a positive image of Russia, promotion of the country’s history, its culture and the nature of information and cultural and social and political activities aimed at attracting foreign tourists to the Russian Federation, the organization of exchanges of delegations of young workers of culture, politics and business for mutual understanding, conferences and exhibitions, the development and implementation of uniform standards for the tourism industry, as well as represent and protect common, professional interests of its members.
The 11th Annual Russia & CIS Hotel Investment Conference (RHIC), the premier meeting for the region’s hotel and tourism investment community, will be hosted at the Azimut Olympic Hotel in Moscow and will take place from 27-28 October 2015.
